Deprecated API

Contents
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
Deprecated Fields
com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.collections.AbstractCollectionConverter.classAttributeIdentifier
          As of 1.1.1, use AbstractCollectionConverter.mapper() 
com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.collections.AbstractCollectionConverter.classMapper
          As of 1.1.1, use AbstractCollectionConverter.mapper() 
 

Deprecated Methods
com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream.addDefaultCollection(Class, String)
          Use addImplicitCollection() instead. 
com.thoughtworks.xstream.alias.ClassMapper.alias(String, Class, Class)
          As of 1.1.1, use ClassAliasingMapper.addClassAlias(String, Class) for creating an alias and DefaultImplementationsMapper.addDefaultImplementation(Class, Class) for specifiny a default implementation. 
com.thoughtworks.xstream.mapper.MapperWrapper.alias(String, Class, Class)
          As of 1.1.1, use ClassAliasingMapper.addClassAlias(String, Class) for creating an alias and DefaultImplementationsMapper.addDefaultImplementation(Class, Class) for specifiny a default implementation. 
com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream.changeDefaultConverter(Converter)
          As of 1.1.1 you should register a converter with the appropriate priority. 
com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.ConverterLookup.defaultConverter()
          As of 1.1.1 you can register Converters with priorities, making the need for a default converter redundant. 
com.thoughtworks.xstream.io.path.PathTracker.getCurrentPath()
          Use PathTracker.getPath() instead. 
com.thoughtworks.xstream.alias.ClassMapper.lookupDefaultType(Class)
          As of 1.1.1, use Mapper.defaultImplementationOf(Class) 
com.thoughtworks.xstream.mapper.MapperWrapper.lookupDefaultType(Class)
          As of 1.1.1, use MapperWrapper.defaultImplementationOf(Class) 
com.thoughtworks.xstream.alias.ClassMapper.lookupName(Class)
          As of 1.1.1, use Mapper.serializedClass(Class) 
com.thoughtworks.xstream.alias.ClassMapper.lookupType(String)
          As of 1.1.1, use Mapper.realClass(String) 
com.thoughtworks.xstream.alias.ClassMapper.mapNameFromXML(String)
          As of 1.1.1, use Mapper.serializedMember(Class, String) 
com.thoughtworks.xstream.alias.ClassMapper.mapNameToXML(String)
          As of 1.1.1, use Mapper.realMember(Class, String) 
com.thoughtworks.xstream.io.HierarchicalStreamReader.peekUnderlyingNode()
          This method should not be used and is only provided for backwards compatability. As of XStream 1.1.1, you can use the HierarchicalStreamReader.underlyingReader() method to get the underlying reader implementation and call implementation specific methods on that. 
 

Deprecated Constructors
com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.collections.AbstractCollectionConverter(ClassMapper, String)
          As of 1.1.1, use other constructor. 
com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.collections.ArrayConverter(ClassMapper, String)
          As of 1.1.1, use other constructor. 
com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.collections.CollectionConverter(ClassMapper, String)
          As of 1.1.1, use other constructor. 
com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.extended.JavaClassConverter()
          As of 1.1.1 - use other constructor and explicitly supply a ClassLoader. 
com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.collections.MapConverter(ClassMapper, String)
          As of 1.1.1, use other constructor. 
com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.collections.TreeMapConverter(ClassMapper, String)
          As of 1.1.1, use other constructor. 
com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.collections.TreeSetConverter(ClassMapper, String)
          As of 1.1.1, use other constructor. 
com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream(Converter)
          As of XStream 1.1.1, a default Converter is unnecessary as you can register a Converter with an associated priority. Use an alternate constructor. 
com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream(ReflectionProvider, ClassMapper, HierarchicalStreamDriver, String, Converter)
          As of XStream 1.1.1, a default Converter is unnecessary as you can register a Converter with an associated priority. Use an alternate constructor.
